verses.verse: (A Psalm of David, for a memorial.) O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> rebuke <S%H3198><s%> me not in Thy wrath; <S%H7110><s%> And chasten <S%H3256><s%> me not in Thy burning <S%H2534><s%> anger. <S%H2534><s%>
For Thine arrows <S%H2671><s%> have sunk <S%H5181><s%> deep <S%H5181><s%> into me, And Thy hand <S%H3027><s%> has pressed <S%H5181><s%> down <S%H5181><s%> on me.

There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> soundness <S%H4974><s%> in my flesh <S%H1320><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of Thine indignation; <S%H2195><s%> There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> health <S%H7965><s%> in my bones <S%H6106><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of my sin. <S%H9128><s%>

For my iniquities <S%H5771><s%> are gone <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> my head; <S%H7218><s%> As a heavy <S%H3515><s%> burden <S%H4853><s%> they weigh <S%H3513><s%> too <S%H4480><s%> much <S%H3515><s%> for me.
My wounds <S%H2250><s%> grow <S%H887><s%> foul <S%H887><s%> [and] fester. <S%H4743><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of my folly, <S%H200><s%>
I am bent <S%H9389><s%> over and greatly <S%H3966><s%> bowed <S%H7817><s%> down; <S%H7817><s%> I go <S%H1980><s%> mourning <S%H6937><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long.
For my loins <S%H3689><s%> are filled <S%H4390><s%> with burning; <S%H7033><s%> And there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> soundness <S%H4974><s%> in my flesh. <S%H1320><s%>
I am benumbed <S%H6313><s%> and badly <S%H3966><s%> crushed; <S%H1794><s%> I groan <S%H7580><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of the agitation <S%H5100><s%> of my heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Lord, <S%H136><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my desire <S%H8378><s%> is before <S%H5048><s%> Thee; And my sighing <S%H585><s%> is not hidden <S%H5641><s%> from Thee.

My heart <S%H3820><s%> throbs, <S%H5503><s%> my strength <S%H3581><s%> fails <S%H5800><s%> me; And the light <S%H216><s%> of my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> that has gone <S%H369><s%> from me.

My loved <S%H157><s%> ones and my friends <S%H7453><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> aloof <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5048><s%> from my plague; <S%H5061><s%> And my kinsmen <S%H7138><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> afar <S%H7350><s%> off.

Those who seek <S%H1245><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%> lay <S%H5367><s%> snares <S%H5367><s%> [for me]; And those who seek <S%H1875><s%> to injure <S%H9567><s%> me have threatened <S%H1696><s%> destruction, <S%H1942><s%> And they devise <S%H1897><s%> treachery <S%H4820><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long.
But I, like a deaf <S%H2795><s%> man, <S%H2795><s%> do not hear; <S%H8085><s%> And I am like a dumb <S%H483><s%> man <S%H483><s%> who does not open <S%H6605><s%> his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Yes, I am like a man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> does not hear, <S%H8085><s%> And in whose mouth <S%H6310><s%> are no <S%H369><s%> arguments. <S%H9640><s%>
For I hope <S%H3176><s%> in Thee, O Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Thou wilt answer, <S%H6030><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>
For I said, <S%H559><s%> "May they not rejoice <S%H8055><s%> over me, [Who,] when my foot <S%H7272><s%> slips, <S%H4131><s%> would magnify <S%H1431><s%> themselves against <S%H5921><s%> me."
For I am ready <S%H3559><s%> to fall, <S%H6761><s%> And my sorrow <S%H4341><s%> is continually <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me.
For I confess <S%H5046><s%> my iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> I am full <S%H1672><s%> of anxiety <S%H1672><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of my sin. <S%H9128><s%>
But my enemies <S%H340><s%> are vigorous <S%H2416><s%> [and] strong; <S%H6105><s%> And many <S%H7231><s%> are those who hate <S%H8130><s%> me wrongfully. <S%H8267><s%>
And those who repay <S%H9608><s%> evil <S%H9567><s%> for good, <S%H9186><s%> They oppose <S%H7853><s%> me, because <S%H8478><s%> I follow <S%H7291><s%> what <S%H9185><s%> is good. <S%H9185><s%>
Do not forsake <S%H5800><s%> me, O Lord; <S%H3068><s%> O my God, <S%H430><s%> do not be far <S%H7368><s%> from me!
Make <S%H2363><s%> haste <S%H2363><s%> to help <S%H5833><s%> me, O Lord, <S%H136><s%> my salvation! <S%H8668><s%>
